name: Boats!
description:
Description

Just the Unity Learn 'Tanks!' tutorial with a few minor tweaks. I wanted to see if I could make a Unity terrain with a low-res heightmap suit a low-poly look; I probably wont ever work on this again.

Keyboard Controls

(Yes, you're meant to fire sideways - might add turret feature if I feel like it)

Player 1 - WASD to move, Space to fire

Player 2 - Arrow keys to move, Enter to fire

Xbox Controls

LT/RT to reverse and accelerate

L Stick to turn

A to fire
